write-mode.name: remove_channel_permissions
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnChannelPermission CP WHERE CP.user_id = :user_id AND CP.channel_id = :cid AND CP.role_id = (SELECT id FROM rhnChannelPermissionRole WHERE label = :role_label)

write-mode.name: reset_channel_permissions
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnChannelPermission (channel_id, user_id, role_id) VALUES (:cid, :user_id, (SELECT id FROM rhnChannelPermissionRole WHERE label = :role_label))

mode.name: get_all_orgs
mode.query: SELECT id as orgid,name as orgname,:label as entname from web_customer where id != 1

mode.name: has_channel_family_entitlement
mode.query: SELECT 1 FROM rhnChannelFamilyPermissions CFP WHERE CFP.channel_family_id = (SELECT id FROM rhnChannelFamily WHERE label = :label) AND (CFP.org_id IS NULL OR CFP.org_id = :org_id)

mode.name: orgs_in_satellite
mode.query: SELECT wc.id, wc.name, (SELECT COUNT(ru.id) FROM web_contact ru WHERE ru.org_id = wc.id) users, (SELECT COUNT(s.id) FROM rhnServer s WHERE s.org_id = wc.id) systems, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rhnTrustedOrgs t WHERE t.org_id = wc.id) trusts, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rhnServerGroup g WHERE g.org_id = wc.id AND g.group_type IS NULL) server_groups FROM web_customer wc

mode.name: trusted_orgs
mode.query: SELECT wc.id, wc.name, (SELECT COUNT(s.id) FROM rhnSharedChannelView s WHERE 1=1 AND s.org_id = torg.org_id AND s.org_trust_id = torg.org_trust_id) as sharedChannels FROM web_customer wc, rhnTrustedOrgs torg WHERE 1=1 AND torg.org_trust_id = wc.id AND torg.org_id = :org_id

mode.name: trust_overview
mode.query: SELECT org.id, org.name, (SELECT count(*) FROM rhnTrustedOrgs tr WHERE tr.org_trust_id = org.id AND tr.org_id = :org_id) as trusted FROM web_customer org WHERE org.id != :org_id
